name: Jeff the Killer: Operation Somnum
description:
May 21, 2008

Jeff the Killer has been sighted in his old hometown in Ohio.  A rise of brutal murders has risen as a result. 

May 23, 2008

OpFor has been spotted in the same area as Jeff.  The Taskforce has sent a unit in to contain the situation.

May 24, 2008

Taskforce unit has not responded.  As a result, the Taskforce has contracted a soldier of fortune who grew up in the area, Jeff's brother.
